headline: Rockwell Automation (NYSE:ROK) Enhances HI-LEX Supply Chain Efficiency With Plex ERP Deployment
summary: Rockwell Automation (NYSE:ROK) saw its stock price rise by 3% over the past month, a period marked by multiple developments for the company, which stand out amid broader market volatility. A significant event was HI-LEX's adoption of Rockwell's Plex ERP system, enhancing operational efficiency for the global manufacturer. Additional notable developments included DST's use of Kinetix Servo Solutions for plant-based protein production and West-Bake Ltd.'s implementation of the Plex Smart...
